alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 13 at 3:44PM CDT until April 14 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...The combination of a clearing sky, light winds and temperatures in the mid 30s will result in frost formation. Temperatures could briefly fall below freezing around sunrise. * WHERE...Western and Northern Logan County, Polk County Lower Elevations, Central and Eastern Montgomery County, Central and Southern Scott County, Yell Excluding Northwest and Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest
